brief_title: Trial of Gemcitabine_Capecitabine Versus Gemcitabine_Carboplatin in Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
inclusion criteria: 

 Female 

 18-70 years old 

 ECOG 0-1 

 Expected lifetime more than 12 weeks
brief_summary: Gemcitabine plus carboplatin in recurrent or metastatic breast cancer is a recommended scheme in National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) guideline. gemcitabine in combination with capecitabine is also effective in Metastatic Breast Cancer (MBC) in some clinical study with small sample.
